/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street bathed in the glow of a bright sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the towering structures that line the street. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the clear blue sky, their glass and steel facades reflecting the sunlight. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and taxis in motion, their colors muted against the stark urban backdrop. A few pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the scene. The perspective of the image is from ground level, looking up at the buildings, giving a sense of their impressive height and grandeur.
